Updating Landing Page SEO Information

Intro

Updating SEO information for Landing Pages is slightly different than for other pages on liferay.com.

Landing pages have URLs like these:

  • www.liferay.com/l/my-landing-page
  • www.liferay.com/resources/l/my-landing-page

Edit SEO Info

  1. Navigate to the landing page you want to update.

  2. Scroll to the bottom of the page.

  3. Click "Edit Landing Page".
  4. Choose "Custom Fields" from the side menu.
  5. Choose the flags corresponding to the translation you are updating.
  6. Update the SEO information.
  7. Publish your changes.
